chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G has the above problem: 
Camera: Does not take sharp pictures and videos, regardless of distance or proximity. 
The device: constant spontaneous reboots or automatic shutdowns, sometimes the device even crashes again during reboots. 
Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair of the 10.06.24. 
The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. 
Without an answer with a valid tracking link before the 15.06.24 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding.

Regards,
Reyhan from Back Market
